name: Mixed Up Words FREE - The 5 Letters Scrambling Game
name_original: Mixed Up Words FREE - The 5 Letters Scrambling Game
description:
Mixed Up Words is a very cool word game for the whole family. The object is simple. Rearrange the letters in each column to unscramble each of the five secret words. Just because you make a word does not mean it's one of the five secret words.

Once you have a correct word it will get locked down and change to dark grey. You must complete each puzzle with in 3 minutes and less than 50 swaps.

Features:
-Includes 1000 secret 5 letter words
-You never get the same puzzle
-Awesome puzzle logic
-Addictive gameplay
-Suitable for all ages
-Nothing to learn - start and go!
-Universal version for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
